original_title: St. Ignatius Church Exposure: Lenten Light Conversions
overview: Lynn Marie Kirby’s Lenten Light Conversions is a “hybrid” work, created first by exposing raw film to light inside St. Ignatius during the forty days between Lent and Easter, then edited on digital video. --Michelle Hyun
title: St. Ignatius Church Exposure: Lenten Light Conversions
